Published March 2020

Cornoavirus Tracker

We set up a system for reporters to input and track cases and deaths that are announced at daily press conferences. We scraped that data and piped it into a mobile-first dashboard. My duties were primarily front-end.

HTML/CSS

Bootstrap

Wireframes

Published April 2020

24 hours in Crisis

Thirty reporters logged minute-by-minute reports, detailing a day during the height of the first wave. My job was to predict what they would bring back, and create templates to rapidly process and present the assets and text.

Handlebars

Templating

Art Direction

Education Homepage

Cornoavirus Tracker

We created a React app, powered by a Google form. I performed market research, created wireframes, chose branding and designed accompanying social assets. I also trained editors on how to input and curate the homepage daily.

CSS

Form responses

Adobe Suite
